code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import image1 from'../Images/image1.jpg';import image2 from'../Images/image2.jpg';import image3 from'../Images/image3.jpg';import image4 from'../Images/image4.jpg';import image5 from'../Images/image5.jpg';import image6 from'../Images/image6.jpg';import'../index.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Slide=()=>{const images=[image1,image2,image3,image4,image5,image6];const[currentSlide,setCurrentSlide]=useState(0);useEffect(()=>{const interval=setInterval(()=>{setCurrentSlide(prevSlide=>prevSlide===images.length-1?0:prevSlide+1);},3000);return()=>clearInterval(interval);},[images.length]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{id:"home",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{id:"carouselExample",className:"carousel slide","data-bs-ride":"carousel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"carousel-inner",children:images.map((image,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"carousel-item ".concat(index===currentSlide?'active':''),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:image,className:"d-block w-100",alt:"Slide ".concat(index)})},index))}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"carousel-control-prev",type:"button","data-bs-target":"#carouselExample","data-bs-slide":"prev",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"carousel-control-prev-icon","aria-hidden":"true"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"visually-hidden",children:"Previous"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("button",{className:"carousel-control-next",type:"button","data-bs-target":"#carouselExample","data-bs-slide":"next",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"carousel-control-next-icon","aria-hidden":"true"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"visually-hidden",children:"Next"})]})]})});};export default Slide;
